properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 4:53AM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW TODAY...

.A potent winter storm will move into the Inland Northwest
Friday. Light snow will begin in the morning hours on Friday with
snow intensity increasing Friday afternoon and night.  Snow
showers will linger through Saturday.

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 17
inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Anatone, Peola, Mountain Road, and Cloverland Road.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY
